ingredient.name: Bifidobacterium lactis
ingredient.description: Well-researched probiotic with excellent survival and colonization properties

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Survives gastric transit and colonizes colon through strain-specific adherence
Competitive exclusion and bile acid metabolism reduce harmful bacteria

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Significant butyrate and acetate production through colonic fermentation

symptom_effects.population_notes: Reduces whole gut transit time by 49±30h to 21±32h in clinical trials

citations.title: Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis HN019 for constipation
